posts.postText:
Thank you for your donation! The SteamID you provided has been added to VIP (Note: You gave me "STEAM_0:036637468", while the correct one was "STEAM_0:0:36637468", if this turns out to be a mistake, please send me a message).

If by any change you are on the server at the time of seeing this and not VIP, please wait until the map changes.
